Package de.chojo.sadu.mapper.reader

Interface ValueReader<T,V>

Type Parameters:
T - The java type that is returned by the adapter
V - The intermediate SQL type that is retrieved from the row
All Known Subinterfaces:
ValueConverter<T,V>
public interface ValueReader<T,V>
Definition of a ValueReader to read columns from a Row and parse it to a java type.
See Also:
  • StandardReader

    • reader

      Function<@NotNull V,T> reader()
      A reader that takes the sql type and converts it into a java type. The passed sql type instance is never null.
      Returns:
      a converted java instance of the sql object
